content.question: The velocity of a particle moving in the <math alttext="x y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-plane can be described by the parametric equations <math alttext="x prime of t equals, 3.4 times the cosine of 3 t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3.4</mn><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>3</mn><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math> and <math alttext="y prime of t, equals 6, t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>′</mo></mrow></msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></math> for time <math alttext="t greater than or equal to 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math>. If the particle is at the point <math alttext="with coordinates 5 comma negative 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math> at time <math alttext="t equals 0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></math>, what is the position of the particle at time <math alttext="t equals 6" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn></mrow></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the point with coordinates 4.149 comma 34" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4.149</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>34</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>
<math alttext="the point with coordinates 4.149 comma 106" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4.149</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>106</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>
<math alttext="the point with coordinates 7.245 comma 34" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>7.245</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>34</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>
<math alttext="the point with coordinates 7.245 comma 106" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>7.245</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>106</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the point with coordinates 4.149 comma 106" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>4.149</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>106</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></math>
